message.content:
The most likely category for this paper would be "Books" (5) because it discusses the work of a comic book artist and his projects. 

The second likely category would be "Arts, Crafts & Sewing" (11) as comic book action involves drawing and artistic skills.

The third likely category would be "Movies & TV" (14) as comic book adaptations are often made into movies and TV shows.

The fourth likely category would be "Collectibles & Fine Art" (28) as comic books and artwork related to them can be considered collectibles.

The fifth likely category would be "Toys & Games" (7) as comic books are often associated with toys and games based on the characters and stories.

prompt:
Title: Draw Comic Book Action
Content: Lee Garbett is one of DC's hot new artists. He has worked on Midnighter, The Highwaymen and Dreamwar at Wildstorm, and the Outsiders, Batman Last Rites and currently Batgirl at DC. In the UK he started out on 2000 AD; other clients include the BBC, The Face, and American Express. He lives in Devon, UK....
